text: The Ying Yang Twins are an American crunk rap group based in Atlanta. The group debuted in 2000 and rose into mainstream with the song Get Low almost three years later. They've had several hit albums and hit songs. Category:American rap music groups Category:Musical groups from Atlanta Category:Hip hop bands Category:Musical groups established in 1997 Category:1997 establishments in the United States Category:1990s establishments in Georgia (U.S. state)
title: Ying Yang Twins
